hero.title: Code I Lab
hero.subtitle: Affordable OpenAI Codex API access for developers. Experience powerful code generation with flexible pricing plans and seamless integration into your existing development workflow.

productFeatures.title: Code i runs everywhere you code

cli.title: Code i CLI
cli.description: Go from prompt to pull request in minutes. Ship new features, fix bugs, brainstorm solutions, or tackle whatever's next with Codex in your terminal.

ide.title: Code i IDE extension
ide.description: Partner with Codex in VSCode, Cursor, and other IDEs. Preview changes, make targeted edits, and stay in flow from idea to implementation.

cloud.title: Code i cloud
cloud.description: Delegate tasks to Codex in the cloud so you can stay in flow. Codex loads your repo in a secure sandbox, generating code you can review, merge, or continue working on locally.

productWorkflows.title: Code I plugs into key workflows to accelerate your entire team

codeReview.title: Code review in GitHub
codeReview.content: Automatically review new PRs and tag @codex to manually request reviews. It compares PR intent with changes, running the code if needed to provide a detailed review.

slackTasks.title: Assign tasks from Slack
slackTasks.content: Codex answers questions, fixes bugs, and explores ideas right from Slack. It automatically pulls context from the conversation to choose the right repo and start working.

sdk.title: Code I SDK
sdk.content: Embed Codex in GitHub Actions and internal tools to automate CI/CD, code maintenance, issue management and other processes.

step1.title: Set it up in your terminal or IDE
step1.description: Download the Codex CLI or IDE extension and subscribe for achieving api-key.

step2.title: Go to a code repo
step2.description: Open your IDE or terminal in a local repo and start Codex.

step3.title: Run your first task
step3.description: Chat with Codex about the repo, or ask it to implement a new feature or fix a bug.

step4.title: Let Codex work
step4.description: Codex independently navigates through your repo to execute your task. Accept its code changes or keep going till the task is complete.

lite.name: Lite
lite.description: For students and hobbyists. Entry-level access with ~10M tokens per month.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Best value for individual developers. ~50M tokens per month for daily coding tasks.

team.name: Team
team.description: For startups and small teams. ~200M tokens per month with high cost efficiency.

footer.description: Affordable OpenAI Codex API access for developers. Code i Lab provides cost-effective code generation tools to accelerate your development workflow and boost productivity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Code i and get started with affordable OpenAI Codex API access.

items.question: How to use Code I?
items.answer: After installing Node.js and the Codex CLI tool, simply configure your API key in the terminal. The setup takes only a minute. We provide a testing interface to verify your connection before subscribing. We offer flexible subscription plans with generous monthly token quotas at affordable prices for accessing OpenAI's Codex model.

items.question: What model does Code I use?
items.answer: Code I provides affordable API access to OpenAI's Codex model, the same powerful code-generation model used in GitHub Copilot.

items.question: What is Code I suitable for?
items.answer: Code I is perfect for developers seeking cost-effective access to advanced AI code generation. It integrates seamlessly with your existing IDE and development tools without changing your workflow. It supports multiple programming languages including Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, C++, Go, Rust, and more. Code i can collaborate with command-line tools like Git and various MCP servers, extending its capabilities to make your development process more efficient and affordable.

items.question: What if I don't use up my monthly token quota?
items.answer: Unused tokens don't go to waste! You can share your API access with friends or team members. We support creating multiple API keys under one account, and you can set individual quotas and expiration times for each API key. Plus members can create up to 10 API keys, and Pro members can create up to 50 API keys.

items.question: Which platforms and programming languages are supported?
items.answer: Code I supports Windows/Mac/Linux and all major programming languages, including Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, C++, Go, Rust, PHP, Ruby, and many more.

items.question: How does Code I pricing compare to alternatives?
items.answer: Code I offers significantly more affordable access to Codex compared to other providers. We've optimized our infrastructure to provide the same high-quality code generation at a fraction of the cost. Plus, our buffered input tokens come with a 90% discount, making repetitive code analysis and refactoring extremely cost-effective.

tutorial.title: Getting Started with Our Service
tutorial.subtitle: Follow these 5 simple steps to start using our AI-powered development tools

step1.title: Quick Start Guide
step1.description:
Install Node.js 18.0.0 or higher and Claude Code CLI tool globally. Get up and running in just a few minutes.

Prerequisites:
â€¢ Node.js - Install Node.js version 18.0.0 or higher
  node --version (v18.0.0 or higher)
â€¢ Claude Code - Install Claude Code CLI tool globally
  npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code

step2.title: Test with API Key
step2.description: Use our test API key to verify everything works correctly and learn how to make your first API call

step3.title: Subscribe to a Plan
step3.description: Choose the subscription plan that best fits your needs and complete the payment process to unlock full features

step4.title: Create Your API
step4.description: Generate your API keys and learn how to integrate our services into your development workflow

step5.title: Start Building
step5.description: Begin using our AI tools to accelerate your development process and unlock new possibilities
